Question 1

Author

Sbonelo Gumede

Published

March 13, 2025

results <- foreach(i=1:100, .combine="rbind") %do% 
    {
        S <- rexp(n = 100, rate = 1)
        c(mean(S), var(S))
    }

colnames(results) <- c("Mean", "Variance")
rownames(results) <- 1:100
kable(results)
